flawed_nl_solution:
The taxes were 40*0.05=$2>>2.
So the price was 40+2=$42>>42.
He got a discount so the price he paid was 42-8=$38>>38.
Since he paid half his price was 38/2=$19>>19.
#### 19

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 34, not 38. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
